content.html:
Well, now that it's public at least I can talk about it: This is a major reason why I quit, and specifically why I quit much earlier than I had originally planned. I don't want to be associated with anyone dealing in crypto nonsense.
twitter.com/Shopify/status…
content.value:
Well, now that it's public at least I can talk about it:

This is a major reason why I quit, and specifically why I quit much earlier than I had originally planned. I don't want to be associated with anyone dealing in crypto nonsense.

content.html: She’s not the only one quitting for not wanting to work on stuff promoting or endorsing crypto. Talked with a software engineer who quit Block after the course changed to crypto and another dev leaving a FinTech pivoting to crypto. I applaud people voting with their feet.
content.value:
She’s not the only one quitting for not wanting to work on stuff promoting or endorsing crypto.

Talked with a software engineer who quit Block after the course changed to crypto and another dev leaving a FinTech pivoting to crypto.

I applaud people voting with their feet.
